channel.title: What class file would I be most likely to find the server settings?
channel.description:
Topic name.
I got a hold of a few really old RSC bots and am trying to get them to work with current private servers. here are the class files:
a ba bb bc bd c d e f g h i j k l m mudclient n o p q r s t u v w x y z
Was just wondering if there would be a certain file that i would most likely find the settings? And what it would look like exactly because ive done cntrl F and searched for port, server, connect.

item.title: What class file would I be most likely to find the server settings?
item.dc:creator: @Tenshu Tenshu
item.description:
@Tenshu wrote:

yeah, i wasnt really sure where to post it as im not trying to make my own server. but i did check both mudclient and m class files. the mudclient file is 500+ pages of code if i was to print it off, and i didnt see anything resembling server settings in the m file.

Read full topic
item.source: What class file would I be most likely to find the server settings?

anyways, I’m pretty sure it is mudclient or m, I don’t really know much about RSC.
